DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Prior Radiation Therapy Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body performed prior to radiation therapy, the use of high-energy radiation from x-rays, gamma rays, neutrons, and other sources to kill cancer cells and shrink tumors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Prior Radiation Therapy Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the a medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body performed prior to radiation therapy, the use of high-energy radiation from x-rays, gamma rays, neutrons, and other sources to kill cancer cells and shrink tumors.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
